SignUpDescription: The number you enter will be linked to your Raahi App account. Make sure you are able to access the OTP sent on this number.
LogInDescription: The number you enter will be linked to your Raahi App account. Make sure you are able to access the OTP sent on this number.
OtpDescription: An OTP has been sent to your registered mobile number, It will expire in 3 minutes.
HomePageDescription: Welcome to Raahi, your friend, companion and guide as you navigate your journey into adulthood.

spalshImages.Title: Your Learning Journey
spalshImages.Description: Learn about your physical, mental, sexual and reproductive health.
